page.title: 12HOUSING IN SILSDEN
page.content: Silsden is a growing town. Population 6000 in 2800 homes.{ {HOUSING AREAS}Town centre: terraced homes for mill workers.{ {New Estates}Waterside to S.E. Woodside to S.W.{ {Council Estate: 3 main roads:}Keighley Rd. Skipton Rd. Bolton Rd.{ {Bradley estate to N.}Mostly built post 1800. Still building in 1985. {TYPES OF HOUSE}Terraced, semi-detached cottage, detached, flats, bungalow, chalet-bungalow.{Values}Â£10000 and Â£45000. Houses are numbered and arranged both sides of streets, roads, lanes, groves etc.{ {MATERIALS}Local millstone, brick, pebble-dash, concrete.{Mains service} to most - telephone and T.V. aerials.{ {Average size}8 rooms: hall, lounge, dining/kitchen, 3 bedrooms, bathroom and W.C.
